name: Luna (itch) (computeruser, Rem's Games, adomaniia, David Liao)
name_original: Luna (itch) (computeruser, Rem's Games, adomaniia, David Liao)
description:
CONTROLS:

Click to advance dialogue 

Click and drag the radio dial to change the frequency 

W/S to speed up/slow down 

4-week student proof of concept by:

Jaden (computeruser.itch.io): Programming, procedural generation, sound design, details, analog radio nerd 

David (David Liao - itch.io): Programming, radio system, sound design, loves chill vibe music

Sarah/Rem (https://remxiia.itch.io): Narrative design, game writing, all-around storyteller

Dominik/Ado (https://adomaniia.itch.io/): 2D visual artist, establisher of Vibes

This is a free student project. We used several existing songs as placeholder assets under fair use. Please check out the artists you've never heard of!

  1. Numbers station recorded by kwahmah_02
  2. "Checking In" by Lena Raine
  3. "Trust Me" by 松下優也
  4. "Warm on a Cold Night" by HONNE 
  5. "Like a River" by Fenster 
  6. "Fireflies" by Owl City
  7. "Safe and Sound" by Capital Cities
  8. "This Must Be The Place I Waited Years To Leave" by Pet Shop Boys
  9. "Natalie" by Envelope Generator
  10. "PHUN-KY" by DJ Tonka
  11. "Aquamarine" by Parallax
  12. "This Must Be The Place" by Talking Heads
  13. "Take Me Home, Country Roads" by John Denver
  14. "Jazz Background Music Loop" by Migfus20
  15. "Autobahn" by Kraftwerk
  16. "What is Love" by Haddaway 
  17. "Among Us Trap Remix" by Leonz
